definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Add this to the cabbage, carrots and apples evenly.
sentences.chinese: 然後在這裏面加入等量的紫甘藍，胡蘿蔔和蘋果。

sentences.english: Get the carrot, onion and garlic from the broth out and throw them out.
sentences.chinese: 把胡蘿蔔，蔥和蒜從肉湯裏取出來扔掉。

sentences.english: She fed the baby on pureed carrots .
sentences.chinese: 她用胡蘿蔔泥餵養那嬰兒。

sentences.english: Five pieces of coal, a carrot, and a scarf are lying on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 五塊煤，一個胡蘿蔔，一條圍巾在草地上。

sentences.english: Bell Peppers, Carrots, Beetroot, onion Rings.
sentences.chinese: 圓椒，胡蘿蔔，紫菜頭，洋蔥圈。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: They need bigger sticks and bigger carrots.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要更大的棒子，更大的胡蘿蔔。

sentences.english: In English we have “ the carrot and the stick” .
sentences.chinese: 在英語裏，我們有“胡蘿蔔加大棒”的說法。

sentences.english: Carotenoids have three absorption peaks in the blue-violet region of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 類胡蘿蔔素在光譜的藍紫部分有三個吸收峯。

sentences.english: The cook is grinding the radishes into slices.
sentences.chinese: 廚師正在把胡蘿蔔磨成細絲。

sentences.english: Yvonne nibbled on some carrot sticks as a snack.
sentences.chinese: 伊馮娜一點點地啃着胡蘿蔔條，當作是在喫零食。
把胡蘿蔔削皮並切成丁。

sentences.english: Add in oil, grated carrots, lentils, stock and milk.
sentences.chinese: 加入油，胡蘿蔔塊，小扁豆，蔬菜湯和牛奶。

sentences.english: The rabbit says "I wish for a lifetime supply of carrots back at my house."
sentences.chinese: 兔子說“我想要我家有一生都喫不完的胡蘿蔔。”

sentences.english: All of these types of carrot have been specially bred.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些類型胡蘿蔔都是經過專門繁殖。

sentences.english: Boil the barley and carrot separately until tender.
sentences.chinese: 分別將大麥和胡蘿蔔塊沸煮至鮮嫩。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
